channel.title: Drop rates, hitpoints and levels
channel.description: I been trying to change the hitpoints drop rates and levels of a npc, the ogre, so I went to npc.cfg changed it and compiled, then when I turned it on its the same :S please help, after I compiled the file is like I edited it but the game isn't so please help.

item.title: Drop rates, hitpoints and levels
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

I’m pretty sure the combat level display is done by the client - you’d have to change that NPC’s combat level on your client. Or is that not what you meant
This is what I’m talking about:

This is what you could add in your client’s class5 (provided you’re using a non-refactored one)

if(i == ####) { //NPC ID class5.anInt61 = 138; //Combat level }

Read full topic

item.title: Drop rates, hitpoints and levels

item.description:
